description.value:
This broad-bladed sword, sometimes called the hand-and-a-half sword, has a longer grip so it can be held in one hand or used with two hands to provide extra slashing power.

This sword is a special model made for the Scarlet Blade class archetype. It was lovingly crafted by said Scarlet Blade's parent and enchanted with a minor effect keeping it pristine in all conditions.

A Spellstriker Staff has been fused into this sword.

Activate F envision

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You use Spellstrike with a non-cantrip spell and miss with the Strike

Effect An explosion of magical energy—stored up for the Spellstrike—explodes out. All creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:5] take 1d6 damage per rank of the spell, with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. This damage is the same type the spell would have dealt, and the activation gains that trait; if the spell would have dealt multiple types of damage, choose one of them. If the damage of the explosion is mental, the save is @Check[will|against:spell|basic] instead of Reflex.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vtCCVe869shMCJMj]{Echoing Weapon}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Sure Strike}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0]{Acid Arrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mrDi3v933gsmnw25]{Telekinetic Maneuver}

Craft Requirements You have the magus's Spellstrike activity. Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
